long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find your tech candidates with CandyJar.
CandyJar is a Talent Sourcing Tool that helps you search for developers by source code assessment on GitHub and makes individual approach to every specialist.

Features' list:

- Searching Engine 
- ATS (Applicant Tracking System) 
- Deeply Analyzed Profiles 
- Contacts (from 10+ sources) 
- AI Message Generator
- PDF CVs export
- Recommendations of Similar Candidates
- Ranking System
- Gmail integration
- Prompts (helps to figure technologies out)
